@daringfireball In fact, NFC payments were pretty common in the UK and EU prior to Apple Payâ€¦ The claim that â€œNFC payments were used by almost no oneâ€ is US-centric and/or disingenuous, and specifically not relevant to the EU where this report originates.
@daringfireball (To be clear, the payments in the UK and EU are mostly from cards, not mobile phones, and I am pretty sure the 2017 90% number refers to phone-based transactions.)
